description: Unregister a plugin at Adapt's remote registry. This command can be run without arguments in a directory which contains the bower.json file for the plugin to be unregistered. Alternatively, specify one of (i) the owner and name of the plugin according to its GitHub endpoint; or (ii) the registered name of the plugin and its GitHub endpoint. Please note that you must authenticate with GitHub to unregister and must be a collaborator on the given endpoint or a collaborator on the Adapt framework. Access to GitHub is for authentication only.
